div.p: The department of English offers opportunities to the students to expose their talents and creativity. The department offers a platform to display their realms of intellect, leadership qualities and critical thinking. It also focuses on enhancing their linguistic capacity through innovative learning techniques. The department also promotes interdisciplinary approach familiarising students with various streams of knowledge.

The department of English offers opportunities to the students to expose their talents and creativity. The department offers a platform to display their realms of intellect, leadership qualities and critical thinking. It also focuses on enhancing their linguistic capacity through innovative learning techniques. The department also promotes interdisciplinary approach familiarising students with various streams of knowledge.
Make students talented in every aspect of language, literature and culture.
Help students acquire skills in English language to enable them for higher studies and research.
